dublin_core.dcvalue: Recent health reforms and strategies have urged Norwegian municipalities to re organize their services to prepare for new ways of combining traditional home based services with technology assisted point of care interventions This paper presents the outcomes from a qualitative study on modelling the municipal health care services for the future The aim was to study the organisation and operation of point of care solutions and identify critical factors for how to model the services of the future
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-08T14:13:23Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2-11-30
Studies in health technology and informatics
Point of Care Solutions: Implementation of Sustainable Service Models.
